il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.parser.experiment

Class ExperimentDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.parser.experiment.ExperimentDirectory

  • public class ExperimentDirectory
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the structure of an experiment directory. An experiment directory contains files defining the settings of the experiment, and optionally files with the results/analysis of running the experiment.

      • getAnalysisDirectory

        public java.nio.file.Path getAnalysisDirectory(@Nullable
                                               java.lang.Integer stepNumber)
        Parameters:
        stepNumber - must be null iff the experiment is not 2-step. Otherwise must be either 1 or 2. The returns path is the same for both null and '2'.

      • getWeightsFile

        public java.nio.file.Path getWeightsFile(@Nullable
                                         java.lang.Integer stepNumber,
                                         int iteration)
        Returns the path of the weights file that should contain weights we get at the end of the given iteration.
        Parameters:
        stepNumber - must be null iff the experiment is not 2-step. Otherwise must be either 1 or 2.
        iteration - one-based.

      • isDone

        public boolean isDone()

      • markAsDoneWithDoneIndicationFile

        public void markAsDoneWithDoneIndicationFile()

      • createEvaluationOnlyVersion

        public void createEvaluationOnlyVersion(@Nullable
                                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> idsOfExamplesToEvaluateOn,
                                        @Nullable
                                        java.lang.Integer trainingIterations,
                                        boolean ignoreUnknownElementsInExperimentSettingsXml,
                                        java.nio.file.Path outputExperimentDir)
        This method should be invoked after this experiment directory was already executed. This method creates a new evaluation-only experiment directory (i.e. one for an experiment in which no training takes place), using as final weights that were already learned in this experiment.
        Parameters:
        idsOfExamplesToEvaluateOn - if null then the test examples of the original experiment are used.
        trainingIterations - the number of training iterations that the weights used are the result of. If null then the total number iterations in the original experiment is used.
        outputExperimentDir - must not already exist. Directory along the path may be missing.

      • getFinalWeightsLearned

        public java.nio.file.Path getFinalWeightsLearned(@Nullable
                                                 ExperimentSettings experimentSettings)
        Parameters:
        experimentSettings - if null, we read the experiment settings from file.
